entry.title: A Note on Recovering from InnoDB Corruption
entry.summary: Corrupt InnoDB tables are difficult to repair. I discovered a tip that might help when dealing with a misbehaving server.

entry.title: Regular Expressions 101
entry.summary: I have an unreasonable love of regex. I held two dozen developers hostage for two hours to hear about it.

entry.title: spf13-vim: The Ultimate Vim Distribution
entry.summary: spf13 brings the IDE experience to Vim. I forked the project to add my own spin.

entry.title: PHP Clone and Shallow vs Deep Copying
entry.summary: I explore the differences in shallow vs deep copies when cloning an object in PHP.
